scripts.build: find . -iname '*.html' -exec sh -c 'git check-ignore -q {} || echo {}' \; | xargs node_modules/.bin/txtinsert && npx tsc
scripts.debug: mkdir out || rm -rf out/{*,.*} && find . -type f -exec sh -c 'git check-ignore -q {} || echo {}' \; | xargs cp --parents -t ./out && find out/ -name '*.html' | xargs node_modules/.bin/txtinsert && cd out && npx tsc
